content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with fuel (coal: 48) and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Furnace at position (5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (5.0, 5.0)) with fuel (coal: 44) and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position unknown) with no power and currently researching automation.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access steam engine entities
- Ensure that steam engines are placed on the map before attempting to access them. If you receive an error indicating that no steam engine is found at a specified position, verify that the entity exists at that location.

### Errors when searching for nearest steam engine
- If you receive an error stating that the nearest steam engine cannot be found, check that at least one steam engine has been placed on the surface. If none exist, you will not be able to locate one.

### General tips
- Always verify the presence of entities before attempting to interact with them to avoid unnecessary errors.
